text: we're witnessing a very rare street
protest in Beijing these people are
family members of those aboard the
missing Malaysian airplane a few minutes
ago they left the hotel where they've
been staying for the past two weeks
armed with t-shirts saying pray for
mh370 and banners saying we want the
truth from Malaysia they tried to board
buses to take him to the Malaysian
Embassy but those buses were stopped by
the Chinese police they broke through
those police lines and they're now
simply marching through the streets of
Beijing to get to the Malaysian embassy
to demand the answers that they say they
